    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        public de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Message getMessage(String sid,
                                          Integer messageId)
        Returns the message with the given id. If sid = test_user, it returns a sample message. Only paticipants of this campaign can see this object.
        Address: GET [server]/resources/message/[messageId]?sid=test_user
        Parameters:
        sid - session id
        messageId - id of message
        Returns:
        searched message

      • deleteMessage

        public void deleteMessage(String sid,
                 Integer messageId)
        DELETES the message with the given id. Only paticipants of this campaign can delete this object.
        Address: DELETE [server]/resources/message/[messageId]?sid=test_user
        Parameters:
        sid - session id
        messageId - id of message

      • getCommentCount

        public Counter getCommentCount(String sid,
                      Integer messageId)
        How many messages has a campaign?
        Failure codes:
        -1 - "It exists no message with this id!"
        -2 - "The session id is not valid!"
        -3 - "You are not the campaign manager. You have no rights to edit this campaign."
        Parameters:
        sid - session id
        messageId - id of message
        Returns:
